translated: The Chapter on the Jackal🔽The Birth Story of the Kiṃsuka Tree

analyzed: kin nu ettha vicikicchatha  na hi sabbesu ṭhānesu
translated: so why do you doubt here?🔽For the charioteer was not asked
in all places.”🔽“Thus, those who do not know
the teachings through all the knowledges,
like the brothers in the kiṃsuka tree.”
The eighth birth story, that of the Kiṃsuka Tree.
